title: The Silent Office
description: Company executive found dead in a locked office. No signs of forced entry. Time is running out.
introText: You are standing outside Office 404. The CEO was found dead here one hour ago. The police have sealed the room, but you have 30 minutes before the Feds arrive.
systemInstructions: In this scenario, the 'truth' section is ABSOLUTE and cannot be changed. The killer, method, and motive are fixed. However, if the player wishes to visit a location not on this list (e.g., roof, basement, parking lot) or speak to a character not listed (e.g., security guard, police officer), you must IMPROVISE these elements in a way that does not contradict the 'truth'. Enrich the scenario, do not restrict the player.

truth.motive: To cover up embezzlement. The CEO had discovered discrepancies in Marcus's accounts.
truth.method: Spiked the CEO's coffee with a high dose of Digitalis (heart medication). Staged it as a heart attack.
truth.details: Marcus entered the office after the murder to delete evidence from the CEO's computer but couldn't crack the password. He panicked and left. He disposed of the Digitalis bottle in the break room trash.
